harmfulIngredients: Added Flavours [Natural Nature Identical and Artificial (Butter, Vanilla & Milk) Flavouring Substances]
userRiskReason: Charlie, this food is highly processed and contains a lot of sugar, refined carbohydrates, and unhealthy fats. It is not suitable for your diabetes and weight loss goals. It is also high in sodium, which can be harmful for your cardiovascular health. Additionally, it contains milk solids, which you are allergic to.
actionableSteps: Avoid this food completely. It is not a healthy choice for you.
Focus on consuming whole, unprocessed foods like fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and whole grains.
Consult a registered dietitian or a certified diabetes educator to create a personalized meal plan that meets your dietary needs and helps you manage your diabetes effectively.
